desk:
We are seeking a skilled front-end web developer with a keen eye for detail and pixel-perfect design to join our team. In this role, you will be responsible for implementing and maintaining the visual design of our web projects, ensuring that they are functional, responsive, and user-friendly.

Key Responsibilities:

Collaborate with our design team to translate mockups into clean, efficient HTML and CSS code
Implement responsive design principles to ensure that our websites look and function flawlessly across all devices
Utilize your knowledge of TailwindCSS to create reusable and modular code
Ensure that all code is optimized for speed and accessibility
Conduct cross-browser compatibility testing and debugging to ensure that our websites are functional on all major browsers
Stay up-to-date with the latest web development trends and technologies, and share your knowledge with the team
Qualifications:

3+ years of experience in front-end web development
Strong knowledge of HTML and CSS
Expertise in TailwindCSS
Attention to detail and a passion for pixel-perfect design
Experience with cross-browser compatibility testing and debugging
Familiarity with Git and version control
Strong problem-solving and communication skills
If you are a talented front-end developer with a passion for creating beautiful and functional websites, we want to hear from you. Apply today to join our dynamic and innovative team!
